name: nameable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be named: In order to learn the word for something, a child must first understand that the thing is nameable. He has some symptoms, but nothing that can be identified as a nameable illness.
important and worth naming or mentioning: He's the first nameable artist of the 17th century. The nameable tragedy is that the recording is ruined by technical problems. Synonyms
notable
noteworthy
More examplesFewer examplesSeveral nameable objects were used in the experiment.These are concepts that are nameable in both languages in the study.
